universum.studios.android.fragment

Class ActivityDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • universum.studios.android.fragment.ActivityDelegate

  • public abstract class ActivityDelegate
extends Object
    ActivityDelegate is used to wrap an instance of Activity in order to hide some implementation details when using Activity context within fragments.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Activity mActivity
      Wrapped activity instance to which will be this delegate delegating its calls.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected ActivityDelegate(Activity activity)
      Creates a new instance of ActivityDelegate for the given activity.

      Wraps the given activity into its corresponding delegate depending on the activity's implementation.

      Delegates to Activity.getActionBar().

      Delegates to AppCompatActivity.getSupportActionBar().

      Delegates to Activity.invalidateOptionsMenu().
      abstract boolean requestWindowFeature(int featureId)
      Delegates to Activity.requestWindowFeature(int).

      Delegates to Activity.startActionMode(ActionMode.Callback).
